news.title: OpenAI calls in the consultants for its enterprise push
news.summary: OpenAI is partnering with four consulting giants in an effort to see more adoption of its OpenAI Frontier AI agent platform.

news.title: Guide Labs debuts a new kind of interpretable LLM
news.summary: The company open-sourced an 8 billion parameter LLM, Steerling-8B, trained with a new architecture designed to make its actions easily interpretable.

news.title: Particle’s AI news app listens to podcasts for interesting clips so you you don’t have to
news.summary: AI news app Particle can now pull in key moments from podcasts, letting readers instantly play short, relevant clips alongside related stories.

news.title: Spotify rolls out AI-powered  Prompted Playlists to the U.K. and other markets
news.summary: Spotify continues to test its AI-powered “Prompted Playlists” feature, now rolling out the tool to Premium subscribers in the U.K., Ireland, Australia, and Sweden.

news.title: Finnish quantum unicorn IQM set to go public
news.summary: Finnish unicorn IQM plans to go public via a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) valuing the company at approximately $1.8 billion — joining the growing cohort of quantum computing companies listed on U.S. stock markets.

news.title: Apple’s newest AirTags are already on sale if you’re looking to upgrade
news.summary: Less than a month after making their debut, Apple’s second-gen AirTags are already receiving their first discount. news.title: The creators of Dark Sky have a new weather app that shares multiple predictions
news.summary: After selling their popular weather app to Apple in March 2020, where some of its core features were incorporated into Apple Weather, the creators of Dark Sky have left Apple to create yet another alternative. news.title: Discord distances itself from Persona age verification after user backlash
news.summary: Discord is attempting to distance itself from the age verification provider Persona following a steady stream of user backlash. news.title: Kohler’s new shower reuses dirty water to get you clean
news.summary: Kohler claims its new Anthem EvoCycle smart shower system can deliver "up to 80% water savings" without the use of showerheads that limit flow or pressure.
